name: Photobomb
description: When taking a photo for a photo challenge, you may cover up to half the frame with a team member's body.

name: Off by one
description: When you are asked a proximity question, you may instead send the location of the second-closest thing.

name: #Nofilter
description: Before sending a photo, you may edit the following settings: Exposure, Contrast, Temperature, Brightness, Saturation, Light balance, Highlights, Shadows

name: Who can really say?
description: When answering a question with more than two possible answers, provide two different answers. One of the answers must be correct, the other can be a lie.

name: Take it slow
description: When the seekers ask you a question, you may respond with a video instead of text. You must clearly identify the answer in your video. Your video must be at most 2 minutes long.
